ComicInfo.Title: Reds All 'Round Us!; Assault By Night!; Riot; Surrender At Dawn!; Platoon Leader
ComicInfo.Summary:
Historical account of the Pozna? Insurrection in Poland (28-30 Jun 1956).
Historical account of the Battle of Appomattox Courthouse (Apr 1865) during the American Civil War; Generals Robert E. Lee (1807-1870) and Ulysses S. Grant (1822-1885) appear.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
